Uses of Package
org.freehep.graphicsio.font

  • Packages that use org.freehep.graphicsio.font 
    Package Description
    org.freehep.graphicsio.font
    Utility classes for encoding, including and/or embedding fonts.
    org.freehep.graphicsio.pdf
    PDF (Portable Document File) Output Format.
    org.freehep.graphicsio.ps
    PS, EPS (PostScript and Encapsulated PostScript) Output Format.
  • Classes in org.freehep.graphicsio.font used by org.freehep.graphicsio.font 
    Class and Description
    FontEmbedder
    A FontIncluder that also embeds all glyphs.
    FontIncluder
    Instances of this class write the information into documents (ps or pdf) that is necessary in order to include or embed fonts.
    FontTable.Entry 
  • Classes in org.freehep.graphicsio.font used by org.freehep.graphicsio.pdf 
    Class and Description
    FontEmbedder
    A FontIncluder that also embeds all glyphs.
    FontEmbedderType1
    Font embedder for type 1 fonts.
    FontIncluder
    Instances of this class write the information into documents (ps or pdf) that is necessary in order to include or embed fonts.
    FontTable
    A table to remember which fonts were used while writing a document.
    FontTable.Entry 
  • Classes in org.freehep.graphicsio.font used by org.freehep.graphicsio.ps 
    Class and Description
    FontEmbedder
    A FontIncluder that also embeds all glyphs.
    FontIncluder
    Instances of this class write the information into documents (ps or pdf) that is necessary in order to include or embed fonts.
    FontTable
    A table to remember which fonts were used while writing a document.
    FontTable.Entry
